display_html:
data OCert c = OCert {
  • ocertVkHot ∷ !(VerKeyKES c)
  • ocertN ∷ !Word64
  • ocertKESPeriod ∷ !KESPeriod
  • ocertSigma ∷ !(SignedDSIGN c (OCertSignable c))
}
name: OCert OCert ocertVkHot ocertN ocertKESPeriod ocertSigma

display_html:
data OCertEnv c = OCertEnv {
  • ocertEnvStPools ∷ !(Set (KeyHash 'StakePool c))
  • ocertEnvGenDelegs ∷ !(Set (KeyHash 'GenesisDelegate c))
}
name: OCertEnv OCertEnv ocertEnvStPools ocertEnvGenDelegs

display_html: data OCertSignable c = OCertSignable !(VerKeyKES c) !Word64 !KESPeriod
name: OCertSignable OCertSignable

display_html: currentIssueNo ∷ OCertEnv c → Map (KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c) Word64 → KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c → Maybe Word64
name: currentIssueNo

display_html:
newtype KESPeriod = KESPeriod {
  • unKESPeriod ∷ Word
}
name: KESPeriod KESPeriod unKESPeriod

display_html:
newtype HashHeader c = HashHeader {
  • unHashHeader ∷ Hash c EraIndependentBlockHeader
}
name: HashHeader HashHeader unHashHeader

display_html:
data PrevHash c
  • = GenesisHash
  • | BlockHash !(HashHeader c)
name: PrevHash GenesisHash BlockHash

display_html:
data BHeader c where
  • pattern BHeader ∷ Crypto c ⇒ BHBody c → SignedKES c (BHBody c) → BHeader c
name: BHeader BHeader

display_html:
data BHBody c = BHBody {
  • bheaderBlockNo ∷ !BlockNo
  • bheaderSlotNo ∷ !SlotNo
  • bheaderPrev ∷ !(PrevHash c)
  • bheaderVk ∷ !(VKey 'BlockIssuer c)
  • bheaderVrfVk ∷ !(VerKeyVRF c)
  • bheaderEta ∷ !(CertifiedVRF c Nonce)
  • bheaderL ∷ !(CertifiedVRF c Natural)
  • bsize ∷ !Natural
  • bhash ∷ !(Hash c EraIndependentBlockBody)
  • bheaderOCert ∷ !(OCert c)
  • bprotver ∷ !ProtVer
}
name: BHBody BHBody bheaderPrev bheaderBlockNo bheaderSlotNo bheaderVk bheaderVrfVk bheaderEta bheaderL bsize bhash bheaderOCert bprotver

display_html:
data LastAppliedBlock c = LastAppliedBlock {
  • labBlockNo ∷ !BlockNo
  • labSlotNo ∷ !SlotNo
  • labHash ∷ !(HashHeader c)
}
name: LastAppliedBlock LastAppliedBlock labBlockNo labSlotNo labHash

display_html: checkLeaderValue ∷ ∀ v. VRFAlgorithm v ⇒ OutputVRF v → Rational → ActiveSlotCoeff → Bool
name: checkLeaderValue

display_html:
data OCertEnv c = OCertEnv {
  • ocertEnvStPools ∷ !(Set (KeyHash 'StakePool c))
  • ocertEnvGenDelegs ∷ !(Set (KeyHash 'GenesisDelegate c))
}
name: OCertEnv OCertEnv ocertEnvStPools ocertEnvGenDelegs

display_html:
data OcertPredicateFailure c
  • = KESBeforeStartOCERT !KESPeriod !KESPeriod
  • | KESAfterEndOCERT !KESPeriod !KESPeriod !Word64
  • | CounterTooSmallOCERT !Word64 !Word64
  • | InvalidSignatureOCERT !Word64 !KESPeriod
  • | InvalidKesSignatureOCERT !Word !Word !Word !String
  • | NoCounterForKeyHashOCERT !(KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c)
name: OcertPredicateFailure KESBeforeStartOCERT KESAfterEndOCERT CounterTooSmallOCERT InvalidSignatureOCERT InvalidKesSignatureOCERT NoCounterForKeyHashOCERT

display_html: data OverlayEnv c = OverlayEnv UnitInterval (PoolDistr c) (GenDelegs c) Nonce
name: OverlayEnv OverlayEnv

display_html:
data OverlayPredicateFailure c
  • = VRFKeyUnknown !(KeyHash 'StakePool c)
  • | VRFKeyWrongVRFKey !(KeyHash 'StakePool c) !(Hash c (VerKeyVRF c)) !(Hash c (VerKeyVRF c))
  • | VRFKeyBadNonce !Nonce !SlotNo !Nonce !(CertifiedVRF (VRF c) Nonce)
  • | VRFKeyBadLeaderValue !Nonce !SlotNo !Nonce !(CertifiedVRF (VRF c) Nonce)
  • | VRFLeaderValueTooBig !(OutputVRF (VRF c)) !Rational !ActiveSlotCoeff
  • | NotActiveSlotOVERLAY !SlotNo
  • | WrongGenesisColdKeyOVERLAY !(KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c) !(KeyHash 'GenesisDelegate c)
  • | WrongGenesisVRFKeyOVERLAY !(KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c) !(Hash c (VerKeyVRF c)) !(Hash c (VerKeyVRF c))
  • | UnknownGenesisKeyOVERLAY !(KeyHash 'Genesis c)
  • | OcertFailure (PredicateFailure (OCERT c))
name: OverlayPredicateFailure VRFKeyUnknown VRFKeyWrongVRFKey VRFKeyBadNonce VRFKeyBadLeaderValue VRFLeaderValueTooBig NotActiveSlotOVERLAY WrongGenesisColdKeyOVERLAY WrongGenesisVRFKeyOVERLAY UnknownGenesisKeyOVERLAY OcertFailure

display_html:
data OBftSlot c
  • = NonActiveSlot
  • | ActiveSlot !(KeyHash 'Genesis c)
name: OBftSlot NonActiveSlot ActiveSlot

display_html: lookupInOverlaySchedule ∷ SlotNo → Set (KeyHash 'Genesis c) → UnitInterval → ActiveSlotCoeff → SlotNo → Maybe (OBftSlot c)
name: lookupInOverlaySchedule

display_html: data PrtclEnv c = PrtclEnv UnitInterval (PoolDistr c) (GenDelegs c) Nonce
name: PrtclEnv PrtclEnv

display_html: data PrtclState c = PrtclState !(Map (KeyHash 'BlockIssuer c) Word64) !Nonce !Nonce
name: PrtclState PrtclState

display_html:
data PrtclPredicateFailure c
  • = OverlayFailure (PredicateFailure (OVERLAY c))
  • | UpdnFailure (PredicateFailure (UPDN c))
name: PrtclPredicateFailure OverlayFailure UpdnFailure

display_html:
data PrtlSeqFailure c
  • = WrongSlotIntervalPrtclSeq SlotNo SlotNo
  • | WrongBlockNoPrtclSeq (WithOrigin (LastAppliedBlock c)) BlockNo
  • | WrongBlockSequencePrtclSeq (PrevHash c) (PrevHash c)
name: PrtlSeqFailure WrongSlotIntervalPrtclSeq WrongBlockNoPrtclSeq WrongBlockSequencePrtclSeq

display_html: prtlSeqChecks ∷ (MonadError (PrtlSeqFailure c) m, Crypto c) ⇒ WithOrigin (LastAppliedBlock c) → BHeader c → m ()
name: prtlSeqChecks

display_html: class (Crypto c, DSignable c (OCertSignable c), KESignable c (BHBody c), VRFSignable c Seed) ⇒ PraosCrypto c
name: PraosCrypto

display_html:
class (Eq (ChainTransitionError (EraCrypto era)), Show (ChainTransitionError (EraCrypto era)), Show (LedgerView (EraCrypto era)), Show (FutureLedgerViewError era), STS (EraRule "TICKF" era), BaseM (EraRule "TICKF" era) ~ ShelleyBase, Environment (EraRule "TICKF" era) ~ (), State (EraRule "TICKF" era) ~ NewEpochState era, Signal (EraRule "TICKF" era) ~ SlotNo, EraPParams era) ⇒ GetLedgerView era where
  • currentLedgerView ∷ NewEpochState era → LedgerView (EraCrypto era)
  • futureLedgerView ∷ MonadError (FutureLedgerViewError era) m ⇒ Globals → NewEpochState era → SlotNo → m (LedgerView (EraCrypto era))
name: GetLedgerView currentLedgerView futureLedgerView

display_html:
data LedgerView c = LedgerView {
  • lvD ∷ UnitInterval
  • lvExtraEntropy ∷ ~Nonce
  • lvPoolDistr ∷ PoolDistr c
  • lvGenDelegs ∷ GenDelegs c
  • lvChainChecks ∷ ChainChecksPParams
}
name: LedgerView LedgerView lvD lvExtraEntropy lvPoolDistr lvGenDelegs lvChainChecks

display_html:
data ChainDepState c = ChainDepState {
  • csProtocol ∷ !(PrtclState c)
  • csTickn ∷ !TicknState
  • csLabNonce ∷ !Nonce
}
name: ChainDepState ChainDepState csProtocol csTickn csLabNonce

display_html: updateChainDepState ∷ ∀ c m. (PraosCrypto c, MonadError (ChainTransitionError c) m) ⇒ Globals → LedgerView c → BHeader c → ChainDepState c → m (ChainDepState c)
name: updateChainDepState

display_html: reupdateChainDepState ∷ ∀ c. PraosCrypto c ⇒ Globals → LedgerView c → BHeader c → ChainDepState c → ChainDepState c
name: reupdateChainDepState

display_html: initialChainDepState ∷ Nonce → Map (KeyHash 'Genesis c) (GenDelegPair c) → ChainDepState c
name: initialChainDepState

display_html: checkLeaderValue ∷ ∀ v. VRFAlgorithm v ⇒ OutputVRF v → Rational → ActiveSlotCoeff → Bool
name: checkLeaderValue

display_html: getLeaderSchedule ∷ (EraPParams era, Signable (VRF (EraCrypto era)) Seed) ⇒ Globals → NewEpochState era → ChainDepState (EraCrypto era) → KeyHash 'StakePool (EraCrypto era) → SignKeyVRF (EraCrypto era) → PParams era → Set SlotNo
name: getLeaderSchedule
